评论详情: Too narrow in the toe box.

评论概述: Great minimalist shoe for the price.
评论详情: Fantastic minimalist shoe for the price. Flat low to the ground soft sole. The material is a basic canvas. So not real weather resistant. I use for light cross training at home.

I got a pair of these zero sole shoes Sept 2023, and since about Oct 2024 they started to come apart where the rubber sole meets the fabric namely where the toe joints flex. I've never had this happen with other shoes I've owned and I typically keep pairs for 3+ years so I likely won't buy these again. The shoes are very comfortable, quiet and light. Often I would feel sharp jabs of rocks while hiking due to the minimal cushioning, which I expected.
I ordered my usual size and they run just right. They’re just what I need as I start lifting a lot heavier at the gym. Hopefully they last a good long time!

We wear various zero-drop shoes (Xero, Altra, Bedrock, etc.), and I ordered several pairs of different styles of Whitin's (including these) based on the great reviews. However, they arrived smelling heavily of noxious chemicals (much more than is typical with other shoe brands we've purchased). I returned them as that was concerning to me, not knowing what chemicals we'd be in contact with or breathing. I since searched reviews and found a few that mentioned this; strange that not more have. Posting in case this helps anyone. Too bad because we would have liked these otherwise.
These fit well and I really love the wide toe box to help transition to more barefoot-style shoes.  The material is soft and they feel wonderful all day!
These shoes are very comfortable and have a slightly wider toe box. I bought a gray and cream pair for a vacation and wore them everywhere. They held up great and are washable.

Absolutely love this brand of barefoot shoes! I have been dealing foot issues for the past couple years and have switched to only wearing barefoot shoes (which has helped immensely!), and this brand is amazing! I was wary of the low price tag at first, compared to other barefoot brands, but I’ve been very impressed with the quality of these shoes. Very comfortable, true to size, good grip, and have so far seemed to maintain nice durability. I have the low tops and the high top styles and did notice the high tops are slightly wider in the toe area than the low tops. Both work great for my feet though. Highly recommend!

I walked in wet grass to get to my car and I have not been able to get grey stains off these shoes. It says machine washable but the form did begin to curve. I’ll be trying the canvas ones next. Loved them for a short bit until this.

It took me a minute to get used to such a low shoe but they're so comfy and light!  This light gray color is my fave, too.  I have narrow feet and thought the shoes would be very loose because the toes seem wide but they're fine.  And, it may be just me but I do find that if I'm going to be hiking through home improvement stores for a bit, the cement flooring calls for thicker soles in my case, so I switch them out.

评论概述: Great for lifting in the gym and everyday wear
评论详情: If you're trying to find a good flat shoe for gym activities, I highly recommend this shoe. Converse just don't cut it for me because I need to feel like I have contact with the ground. This allows you to really grip the ground beneath you when squatting while giving you a tiny bit of support. They're great for daily wear as well.
I wasn’t sure how I was going to like these shoes especially with the price but I have been using them for a couple months and they are amazing lifting shoes!
Wife likes fit and color. Bought 2 pairs.
excellent fit, nice material, roomy toebox without looking huge
This is my second pair of Whitin shoes and find them very comfortable and easy to wear sneakers.  would recommend to anyone wanting a 'barefoot' style or just lightweight casual shoe.

This is my third pair of this kind of shoe--I also have them in gray and black. I wear these as my "white keds" style sneakers, since name brand Keds are too narrow and crunch up my toes. I thought they might look a bit clownish since the toe box is so square, but they really don't--they're pretty low profile and not clunky. If you like a lot of arch support, these aren't for you. One downside is they don't breathe super well so they do get stinky, but they are machine washable. Some other commenters mentioned rivets popping out after a few wears, and that has not happened to me on any of my three pairs.
Comfortable seem to be well made. Run a little small so I had to return for next size.  I removed insole for a little more room to wear with light socks and for more of the "barefoot" feel.
I love these shoes. I like the stretch and ease to out on. Color is exactly as shown and very nice in person. These feel good on my feet, not too thin but still keep their flexibility.
4th pair of Whitin shoes for the family. We all love them

It took me a while to get used to them. You almost feel like you are walking barefoot.  Since i have them, I am more grounded in my workouts. Washed them in the washer a few times and they still look like new. The shoelaces are not so good, they wear out pretty fast. I just bought different laces.  Thats why only 4 stars.Will definitely buy them again.
Cute from the side but looking at them straight on they look ridiculous and cheap.
I did a lot of walking in these over a weekend. I had no pain in my feet, legs or back. I just wish they came in half sizes, but I sized up and they work fine.
Cute but hurt my heal when walked.
Didn't hold up to the standard of a Whitin products from the past
They stop my feet from feeling scratchy and weird.  It sort of feels like being barefoot.
Still too narrow for a wide foot.

My wife wanted both a shoe that was the same height toe and heel. Plus she had trouble on slippery surfaces.  This shoe is perfect. Beside that, I heard her women friends complimenting her on their looks!

评论概述: Not much of a chance to wear them yet.
评论详情: Seem comfortable from trying them on and walking the house. Excited for the 'barefoot' style. Might soil easily however, we'll see.
My toes have more room and don't hurt any more.  Very comfortable and stylish.

Product is ok. Not real sturdy but cute comfortable. I would never order again from this company. Ordered 2 pair in different sizes. Returned at Kohl's the wrong size. Received notification of refund. Got rid of return receipt from Kohl's after a month assuming refund was complete. Shortly after was recharged for return stating they never received it. I could not find a way to contact a person to deal with situation. You lost my business after double charging me.
Looks good with my jeans and shirts. Quality was OK, but the cost should be much less.

评论用户: It is short on the sleeve and the. Fabric is not to soft!!!
评论详情: Like them
Good Quality, comfortable fit as expected

评论概述: Comfortable but I prefer the wide width.
评论详情: I have a couple pair of these shoes in wide. This is the first pair I bought in regular width. A weird thing I noticed in them is the interfacing in the toe is more stiff and noticeable in this pair. I hope it doesn't become more noticeable as they get worn in. They are comfortable but I can only wear them sockless. With socks they are too snug. So if you have wide feet you might consider the wide width. This is a great shoe to start off your bear foot experience. Price is much more reasonable than other name brands. I have also tried out the generic brands on Amazon and the quantity is not as good.

I should have sized up half a size since I have wide feet. Since this is a barefoot shoe, I assumed it would have a large toe box. It does have a different shaped toe box, but not as wide as I needed.
I kinda forced this "barefoot" shoe idea on her and picked these myself. She LOVES them.
These fit fine, but squeak on every hard surface you walk on. Even cement.

I wear an 8.5, these don't come in half sizes so I got a 9 and they are perfect. I have neuropathy and have several pair of $100 to $200 dollars shoes, none of which I can wear without pain. I will be ordering every color in these!
Comfortable and size are true

评论概述: They are cute but not slip resistant for work
评论详情: I like them they are cute. Wish they were really slip resistant.
I love these shoes, they are light in weight,  and very comfortable.
Great for my feet

I love the fit...they are very comfortable! I bought them for work....I needed slip resistant.....I was very hopeful...but I am disappointed...  So if you want them for the fit and comfort..they are perfect...

I honestly love these shoes.  These are the 2nd one I’ve bought, the first ones I had were the like outdoor hiking ones and I’ve had those for 3 years and no problems.  These are nice because the toe box isn’t so ridiculously huge, there just right, lots of space for me (my feet turn into pancakes when Im standing) and they look nice.  In my experience there very durable, (I abuse my shoes a lot) look nice, and feel good.  Very thin sole so you feel everything, this is exactly what I expected and i’m loving the freedom and ground feel.  I see one star reviews on these ones and the other ones saying that the soles are super thin and how you can feel everything, little sharp pebbles and what not, how it feels like your literally barefoot..  uhm, yeah?  That’s kinda the point?  I don’t understand people who go out of there way to find shoes like this then leave bad reviews, there literally called “barefoot shoes”.  Anyways enough of my rant, I love them and I will be buying more in the future.

I normally wear size 7 and ordered the light grey with white sole in size 7 but my toe hit the front and didn't love the look so I ordered the dark grey with gum sole in 7.5 and love them. They are super comfy and cute.

评论概述: So nice to find basic, inexpensive tennis shoes
评论详情: When I was a kid, the standard inexpensive tennis shoes were Ked's.These are like a vegan, barefoot version of Ked's.  They are basic, cheap, and get the job done.  Sometimes you just need a basic little tennis shoe, and don't want to spend $150+.  These are perfect for that!  I got the solid black, so it is not as obvious how cheap they are.  The thin sole makes them barefoot, with minimal cushioning.  Nice inexpensive everyday shoes.

I have now bought several pairs of this brand (in different colors, and as gifts for others.) The shoe is super lightweight, very breathable, and have now been washed in the washing machine several times (I remove the inserts and let air dry). The first time I wore them, my lower legs felt sore, but within a day, it was gone. My calves, feet and ankles are stronger and I feel more balanced and grounded when I wear them. Which is usually everyday. Perfect for dog walks and urban hikes. Aesthetic Warning: the toe box is a bit wider than the typical sneaker. But I don’t mind, because they are so incredibly comfortable.

评论用户: I couldn’t get it to work at first ? But now it’s ok . Cancel return
评论详情: I love these shoes. I have serious feet issues and my ADR recommended a wide toe box shoe. I wear size 11 and nit easy to find. Well these shoes are awesome. They fit perfectly and I can wear them all day with no problem .,The only problem I do have is they don’t have enough colors for me
Roomy toe box. Minimum support. Maybe because its a transition to bare foot shoes. I like the style. I'll give these a shot because they are comfy.

I love these! Unlike stiff shoes that hug your toes these don’t need time to stretch before they get comfortable. I switched from a pear of cloth top shoes that were a couple years old and so worn they were falling apart. These new shoes were just as spacious as the old ones (and arguably more so on my toes) but my feet don’t just slide off the sides of the soles like they did in the previous ones. I can’t believe how instantly comfortable these were.

This is my second pair of the black Whitin shoes, purchased about 10 months apart, which is why I'm giving a 3 start rating. I understand that these are knockoff Vivos, but I was hoping for at least one year of wear before having to replace them. I don't wear these everyday, and yet, they only lasted 10 months, as the soles in my current pair are falling apart. Reminds me of the boot theory where I'll wind up spending more money on these shoes until I'm able to afford a pair of Vivos which will probably last multiple years.  Despite my complaints, the shoes are reasonably comfortable, it is indeed wide toebox, and I'm grateful for that. Just be mindful that these are made with low quality materials, and if you wear them regularly, you'll probably need to replace them within 6 months.

评论概述: Wider for a more natural fit
评论详情: I have really enjoyed these shoes. They are great for everyday wear and are very comfortable. The soles are incredibly squeaky though. It’s mildly entertaining albeit somewhat embarrassing at times.

I bought these to try out barefoot shoes, since I have wide feet & have had bunions in the past. I like the style, and the fit is mostly good (room to splay my toes), but they feel a bit tight in the middle of the shoe. This causes discomfort if I wear them for too long, and I wore them for enough work shifts that it wasn’t just me getting used to barefoot shoes.  Overall, they’re a good shoe, but if you have wider feet or are sensitive to certain areas being too tight, they may not be right for you.  I got a size 40 (9.5 women’s) and they fit true to size.
Got three pairs and looking for more  but can only find wide widths now

These shoes don’t look like the photos. They look a LOT cheaper in person. My wife bought these and was pretty disappointed that they were shipped without packaging, and that they weren’t like the pictures online. Not worth $40+

These shoes are very comfortable and look nice. I was about to buy the expensive brand that looks like these, but decided to give them a try. Took a trip to Japan and Korea and literally wore them every day. Very comfortable for long walks!!
These are very light but also very comfortable. I have gotten compliments every time I wear them. My mom even ordered a pair for herself. Just size up to the next full size.
These shoes were comfortable from the first time they were worn. They are great for a wide instep and a cute style and color.
Super cute, incredibly comfy and so far durable! I love throwing these on bc they are so easy and extremely versatile! I l  ok be these minimalist shoes!
Very comfortable but I work in a bar and they are not very slip resistant. Probably great for everyday wear but not for work.

I LOVE how this fit my foot perfectly. The extra toe room is amazing. But after having them for 5 weeks, the back of the heels are uncomfortable. After taking a closer look, there is a hard plastic piece inside of the back of the heel. That plastic piece has broken or just bent inwards but it no longer stays upright. Make sure to take care not to let that bend when putting the shoe on.

These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. Nice wide toe box. Flat sole. I  chose  these over my other shoes on a daily basis.  They are a flat shoe, which I didn't have trouble  adjusting to. I wore them all day the first day. I even wore them without socks a few times. Seem sturdy,

I adore these shoes! I purchased the canvas uppers about 6 months ago, and while I liked them I could tell that my feet were not ready for barefoot shoes yet. I needed stronger feet first. So I wore the canvas Whitins for short intervals (20-40 minutes) only. But these transitional beginner shoes are perfect for me. That's exactly what I am: a beginner transitioning to barefoot shoes. I'll be able to wear these knit-upper shoes for my daily footgear. I'm thrilled.  For the person complaining that Whitin had replaced the canvas-upper shoes with these knit-upper shoes...I believe Whitin still makes and sells the canvas uppers. These knit-upper shoes are just a different model. Here are the canvas uppers: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BN8148LB/.

Well made and comfortable. I am usually a size 8.5 us and the 8 fits good. First time trying transition shoes. I have only been wearing them for a couple of weeks and my foot pain is not as bad as it had been. Fingers crossed 🤞 that they are helping.

Most comfortable barefoot shoes I’ve owned! No foot pain since wearing them. This makes the third time I’ve bought them but the soles wear out super fast. Holes in my shoes. 🫤 I’m trying another brand next to see if they last longer.

They fit well and seem well made. It is spacious and cute. Definitely worth trying a pair! I hate shoes with arch support (I have strong arches and the dislike the discomfort of an added lump in my shoe). Luckily these are very simple and flat.  Thank you!
First pair of barefoot shoes and these have been great since the first time I wore them! They are so comfortable that I wear them all day and my feel fill good!
The wide toe box was nice, but almost too wide, unfortunately for me the color didn’t match the dress I bought them for, but they seemed like good quality for the price.
I returned these cheap shoes because that is exactly what they are. They are not as wide as they claim. My regular size shoes are wider than these shoddy products.

Wanted a wide toe box shoe to avoid squishing my toes. Also have traditionally worn shoes without arch support, so the zero drop wasn’t that new to me. This shoe lasted me for nearly a year with daily wear. Some holes in the sole now, but otherwise great shoe to try out for the cost. Mainly got this shoe because I couldn’t decide what to get long term. Recently discovered Lems, which I’m really liking. Overall, recommend this shoe for the price. I probably will not repurchase though because the quality isn’t super high in comparison to more expensive shoes.
Bonitos cómodos
I ordered these for use on my mini trampoline.  They are well made and very nice looking but not comfortable for the jumping workouts I’d be doing in them.

These shoes are very comfortable for traveling with lots of walking. We averaged about 25k steps a day for 3 weeks with inclines, declines, and cobblestones and they held up great. My feet still got tired at the end of the day or after a lot of cobblestones, but that’s to be expected. The white knit material was a little hard to keep clean and I rubbed them with a damp cloth each night to help. They look pretty good and mostly all white again after soaking and scrubbing them when we got home. Gum soles helped a lot - white soles would not have been easy to maintain. They were cute with summer dresses, shorts, and jeans.  They have a nice wide toe box and I didn’t get any blisters or have a break in period. I replaced the foot bed that comes with the shoes with a Dr Scholls gel insert and that made them quite comfortable.  I would absolutely buy them again and will continue to use them as a go to daily and travel shoe.
Will probably buy another pair. Love the wide toe area. Great everyday shoes.

I've worn these shoes two days in a row- no "break-in period" needed. As someone who has always needed to order "wide" shoes I finally took the plunge and ordered these. I was happily surprised at how much room my toes have in them while still feeling snug and secure around the rest of my foot. I've worn them with and without socks, both are very comfortable although I am probably going to wear socks for my own sensory needs. I am a naturally barefoot person and always prefer to take my shoes off whenever possible. These shoes do have some support in them too. I saw some people mention that they could "see the glue" and maybe they are right but I don't personally think that it poses any problem or issue with appearance.

评论概述: Ok on comfort but not breathable
评论详情: I love the wide toebox but they do not allow good airflow causing stinky feet.  I got the light pink which get dirty very easily. After 5 months they have started ripping so their durability is not great
I wish they were for bigger sizes also.
Please bring back the Dark Grey with Black soles, best ever!
They're extremely comfortable! I will probably buy another pair soon. I've walked many miles on these shoes all over Portugal. No issues at all. They're definitely my go to shoes now!
These are the most comfortable tennis shoes I've ever had due to the wide area for the toes.
Switching to barefoot shoes, with a wide toe box has saved my feet. These are an incredibly affordable and comfortable option for those looking to start with barefoot style shoe.
I love these shoes. As I’ve gotten older my arches have fallen so my feet are pretty flat. I can wear them all day with no issues.
Got them yestorday, wore them today to work 10 hours on my feet! Any my feel are feeling great! Im going to order another pair or two right now.

Love the shoes. I’ve been suffering from plantar fasciitis for over a year. I’m transitioning to zero drop, wide toe box shoes. These work great and are stylish. I wear between a 6 and 6 1/2. Since these are not sold in half sizes, I ordered the 6 and they fit great!

I had high hopes but I wore them one time on a walk around the block and they hurt my feet very bad. They are very flat with no arch support. 15 minutes into my walk, my foot and started clicking and I developed a blister on the bottom of my foot. I wish I hadn’t wasted my money. They looked cuter in the picture too.

I work on my my feet all day. my son told me about these shoes and recommended i get them for the health of my feet and body. i can say, I love them. It feels so refreshing to have room around my toes! highly recommend. Also, i always walk around the house barefoot, so my feet are use to the barefoot feel. if you wear shoes all the time, you will want to start off slowly.
Worth the price,  highly recommend.
I like the fit and feel of these. I took out the insoles to be more barefoot. I own another model of minimalist Whitins which have good traction on tile floors. This model slides easily. Returning.
Love these! First of all they are super cute and go with everything. Second I wear them to the gym and my balance improved so much that my trainer and I were shocked.

I'm really bummed I have to send these white sneakers back.  The fit was great, 7.5 wide. I really like them.  Very cute and comfy, but there's a seem in the tip of the toe that hits my big toes just wrong.  I get it , the toe of the shoe needs form but this just isn't working for me.
Bought this to wear on vacation and it was easy and comfortable to walk long distances in. Nice wide toe box but not too wide that it gives an unflattering look.

I'm a massage therapist and on my feet a lot, usually 5 days a week. These are my work shoes and easily the most comfortable pair I've owned. I've had them for over a year now and wear them to work and for walking, and they've held up really well. Very comfortable and durable. Getting ready to buy a second pair to have a back up and another color option. Had to buy about 1/2 size larger than a normal shoe.
Fit and comfort

评论概述: Could be comfortable, but quality control is lacking
评论详情: I tried these on and immediately noticed a difference in height for the heel of the shoe. It felt low and a bit tight on my left Achilles and I knew it would rub enough to cause a blister if I wore them out walking. I can't comment much on anything else because I couldn't wear them for more than a minute without focusing on how unconfortable the left one was.

评论概述: Perfect for wide feet. Love these shoes!
评论详情: I love, love, love these shoes. The first time I wore them was while traveling, so there was a lot of walking between gates to and from the airport.  I have wide feet and my doctor recommended I only wear shoes with a wide toe box. Before I sunk some serious cash into some shoes, I thought I would give these a try. They have a slight arch support and are super comfortable and flexible. The fit around the toe area was spot on. They have a minimalist design with a mesh upper that breathes so that your feet stay cool. I really liked the old school gum sole that has a good grip when walking.

The shoes have a comfortable toes area and the feel good. I was skeptical but pleased with the feel. However,  the left shoe is a couple of cm shorter than the right and irritated my foot. If I walked a bit longer it would have created a blister.
Shoes were soooo comfortable from the minute I put them on, "breaking" in not necessary. Wore them to work the first day with NO issues. Love them.  No cons.

I purchased two pairs, one gray one one black. The black pair is great looking and super cushy comfortable but the gray pair is just okay and doesn’t compare to the black ones. It doesn’t have the Cush like the black pair for some reason
This shoe is comfortable and I love the roomy toe box but the rest of the shoe is very wide.  When purchasing I chose the regular size, not wide, but the shoe is too wide.

评论概述: If you need flat sneakers, these are the best!
评论详情: Thin yet padded sole that doesn't cause your foot to turn on it's edge. My weight rolls towards the outer edge of my foot (supination) and most shoes over exaggerate this.
